sentences.sContent: He chalked out a design on the blackboard.
sentences.sContent_eng: He chalked out a design on the blackboard.
sentences.sCn: 他用粉笔在黑板上勾划出一个图样。

sentences.sContent: She rubbed the exercises off the blackboard after class.
sentences.sContent_eng: She rubbed the exercises off the blackboard after class.
sentences.sCn: 下课后她把习题从黑板上擦掉。

sentences.sContent: The teacher knocked on the blackboard to catch our attention.
sentences.sContent_eng: The teacher knocked on the blackboard to catch our attention.
sentences.sCn: 老师敲了敲黑板以引起我们的注意。

remMethod.val: black(黑色的)+board(板， 木板)→黑板

trans.tranOther: a board with a dark smooth surface, used in schools for writing on with  chalk
